ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] EQ Windows
ygData.msgSnippet: I like the windowed option, but I won t play in that mode. I ll just switch to the windowed mode if I need to look something up online, then I ll take it back
ygData.messageBody:
I like the windowed option, but I won't play in that mode. I'll just switch to the windowed mode if I need to look something up online, then I'll take it back to full screen. My system can't handle running in a window, either.

 "mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...>" <MLockridge01@...> wrote:

Well, I just got on a bit ago, hunting in EW. Got the message that
they were doing an emergency shutdown in 10 minutes. Had to jump out.
I must assume that the EQ window option is the probable cause for
this emergency action.

Still, the idea is good. I can see value in going out of the game to
check an information site, or even answer a chat. I don't know if my
marginal system can handle the window mode, but I will probably try
it.

I think it is a good idea.

Barto
